DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate effectiveness tolerability MK8141 lower blood pressure patient hypertension ( high blood pressure ) .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Determine Effectiveness Tolerability MK8141 Patients With High Blood Pressure ( MK-8141-006 )
DOC.criteria: You 35 65 year age In past 14 day treat hypertension In past 14 day take 2 medication treat high blood pressure You woman able child use birth control You take 2 medication treat high blood pressure You history stroke , transient ischemic attack ( TIA ) , heart attack , congestive heart failure , coronary artery bypass surgery You Type 1 2 diabetes mellitus You active liver disease , gallbladder disease , bowel disease You HIV positive You certain type cancer You abuse drug alcohol You participate another clinical study last 4 week
